abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
abilities.description: Dralmorrer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Dralmorrer is a 7th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
* Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
* 1st level (4 slots): longstrider, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
* 2nd level (2 slots): magic weapon, misty step

abilities.name: War Magic.
abilities.description: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

abilities.name: Weapon Bond.
abilities.description: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.
